name: 【SCP】器関ノ彷徨 -The will of a single Tale- 第１部
detailed_description:
Page link

"weibo"

mail address
　stoner.tomohito@gmail.com


Wanted translator

Producer is looking for volunteers who translate this game into English.
(Those who can keep in touch in Japanese)


About the Game

※This game will be a sequel to 【SCP】器関ノ彷徨 -The will of a single Tale-【DEMOver.】.
　Also, as of 2/15, only Part 1: Chapter 1 will be made public.
　Therefore This is very short content.

[Story]

In 2019, one month after the incident of Nadatara mura.
Bando who succeeded in escaping from the village was confined at site X-3 of the foundation / Japan branch.

However, due to the efforts of Captain Albert he will be released and the assignment to a new unit will be decided.

At the same time he was told by the captain that the circumstances surrounding the Foundation had changed significantly.


What is the identity of "Ryouzan kanata"?

Grudge of "Sarkic Cults".

The mystery of "Project MA13".


All stories begin again ......


[Description]

"器関ノ彷徨 -The will of a single Tale-" is a story told in the world view of the SCP Foundation.
This work is a secondary creation work of "SCP Foundation" and follows CC BY-SA 3.0

Mostly "MMD" is used for characters and backgrounds.

※The genre of this game is visual novel.
　Please enjoy the story.

short_description: -"Do you believe the actuality now?" When the SCP Foundation moves, you will be a witness of {Project MA-13}.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel® Core™2 Duo Processor P8700
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
